alert.note: Alert for Jackson County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 05 at 9:35PM PST until January 06 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 7 PM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE... The southern part of the Rogue Valley, from Ashland to south Medford. This includes portions of Interstate 5 and the communities of Ashland, Phoenix and Talent. This also includes portions of Highway 140 in the Cascade Foothills. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 7 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
